main event: On April 2, 1952, 15 AF personnel observed 2 or 3 smaller balls associated with a large fireball in Temple, Texas.
interesting points: The observation was made at 2015 CST,The larger fireball had a green body with a red and yellow tail,The smaller balls were seen to drop from the larger fireball,The sighting lasted for 10-15 seconds,Similar sightings were reported from nearby locations including Evant and Stephenville.
sighted object: 2 or 3 smaller balls and a large fireball
